Articles.Content:
My KSP crashed yesterday while I was testing my brand new ramjet plane; the game was crashed when my plane was crashed. Today I turned it on again, and texts seemed to be like earthworm creeping. I assume that this is because of the crash for it did not happen before, but I'm not sure. Does anybody know how to fix this?

OS: Win 7 Home Premium (32-bit)

RAM: 4GB

Graphics Driver: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M Ver. 9.18.13.4411

 

P.S.  Sorry for my bad English

 

Edited February 16, 2016 by Hans Druli

Hi @Hans Druli, the effect you see there is caused by KSP running in OpenGL mode on Windows, if you are using -force-opengl to run KSP please try without.

If this is not the case then it is likely your graphics card driver has not been correctly detected, please reinstall your graphics card driver and reboot your PC.

@sal_vager

Thanks! But the problem was solved already. I just turned it off and on again and there was no more problem about displaying texts. I think it is temporary.

Anyway, I really appreciate your answer. I'll try as you advised when similar problem pops up again!
